TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Odis_Allison, title = Odis_Allison, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Odis_Allison} }

S.FORM: Odis Alliso mhtuw ryax tya 2 na byacing 10 nquw kawas ta 1949 squw Amerika. nalan unroing NBA pzyuwi mari na yawa,198cm kinwagiq nya ruw 88kg kinusuw nya, kki`an nya squw pzyuwi mari ga te gleng, mqwasbiru riygak na UNVL, KAWAS te 1971 ga maki squw sinsyuw te zmagal wal nya galunu , qyax niya mtama thekan squw NBA ga min 36 pispngan nya. Odis Allison sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, praw maki' tayglaing. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Odis Alliso mhtow ryax tya 2 na byacing 10 nqow kawas ta 1949 sqow Amerika. nalan onroing NBA pzyowi mari na yawa,198cm kinwagiq nya row 88kg kinosow nya, kki`an nya sqow pzyowi mari ga te gleng, mqwasbiro riygak na UNVL, KAWAS te 1971 ga maki sqow sinsyow te zmagal wal nya galono , qyax niya mtama thekan sqow NBA ga min 36 pispngan nya. Odis Allison sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, praw maki' tayglaing. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
